short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utility Meter Viewer allows you to fetch data from a meter devices over either the Meter-Bus, Kamstrup (KMP) or IEC-61107 protocol.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome OS application to read information from M-Bus, IEC61107 and Kamstrup 66CDE, 401, 402, 6XX/8XX (KMP) utility meters.
